zh.Trusteeship: LedgerX托管支持  抵押BTC更放心
zh.TrusteeshipDetail1: LedgerX是由美国CFTC认证的衍生品交易所，同时拥有SEF和DCO资质
zh.TrusteeshipDetail2: 您抵押的BTC资产将由LedgerX提供托管技术支持和监管服务，抵押期间保证资产安全
zh.Technology: HD冷钱包技术   抵押资产更便捷
zh.TechnologyDetail: 每次抵押贷款，资产都托管于完全独立的钱包中，保障资产安全、极速放款退币、实时查询数字资产转账记录
zh.Money: 最高500万，最长90天，贷款计划随心配
zh.MoneyDetail: BTC抵押资产支持最高贷款金额500万，最长贷款天数90天，范围内可自定义贷款计划，最大限度满足您的贷款需求

en.Trusteeship: LedgerX custody service to ensure BTC security
en.TrusteeshipDetail1: LedgerX is a CFTC-certified derivatives exchange with both SEF and DCO qualifications.
en.TrusteeshipDetail2: Your mortgaged BTC assets will be hosted with LedgerX's technical support and regulatory services, ensuring asset security during mortgages
en.Technology: HD cold wallet technology provide more convenient mortgage assets custody
en.TechnologyDetail: The mortaged assets are all in the custody of separate wallets ensuring security, quick loan giving or coin withdrawal, real-time transfer records
en.Money: Max. 5 million, 90 days, loan plan at your will
en.MoneyDetail: BTC mortgaged assets support the max. amount of 5 million loan within a period of up to 90 days; a customized loan plan within the scope can satisfy your loan demand
